channel.title: Big Website to come, Staff wanted, they will get a work email address
channel.description:
Hi everyone. i currently have the following jobs on offer for the codexonline.info website. The website contains forums, game reviews, your own email @codexonline.info, games. If you have a great game you want on my site. Email the code or the link to admin@codexonline.info. [b]Moderator[/b] [i]Positions open: [b]5 for now[/b][/i] 1. soule 2. 3. 4. 5.
[b]Support crew[/b] You will be working at our support desk. (www.codexonline.info/support) [i]Positions open: [b]4 at the moment[/b][/i] 1. 2. 3. 4.
[b]Server Coders (C++)[/b] Required to code our new server. [i]Positions open: [b]5. will open more later[/b][/i] 1. 2. 3. 4. 5.
[b]Advertising Crew[/b] Required to advertise codex online as much as you can. I.E making affiliates [i]postions open:[b] 5 [/b][/i] 1. 2. 3. 4. 5.
[b]Game Finding Crew[/b] You will be requried to find good games that i can put on my site. As i have had [b]atleast[/b] 150 ask for games on my site. Positions open: [b]6. I will open more later[/b] 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6.
If you want a postion in our staff, please use the following layout:
[code]name: What job you want: experience: Why you want job:[/code] [b]I will NOT accept moderators on my forum untill their post count is atleast 20 (on this forum) and they have signed up at my forum (www.codexonline.info/smf).[/b] PM me for more info,
ikick I have permission to post
